challenges.title: The Good Life
challenges.body: Book travel and accomodation through one of the Holiday providers on mWallet to claim 250 Coins.

challenges.title: Kudos King
challenges.body: Use mWallet Gifts to reward 3 team members with a coffee kudos and earn 10 Gold Coins.

challenges.title: Fashionista
challenges.body: Spend over $300 at any one of our fashion retailers and double your  coins for that transaction.

challenges.title: Charity Royale
challenges.body: Spend 1,00 coins to one or more of our sponsered charities to claim your Gold Bullion!

challengesSuncorp.title: Earn 1000 Points
challengesSuncorp.body: Complete this health survey and receive 1,000 points

challengesSuncorp.title: Earn 25,000 Points
challengesSuncorp.body: Sign up for a Suncorp Home Insurance policy online

challengesSuncorp.title: Earn 500 Points
challengesSuncorp.body: Successfully refer a friend to Home Insurance
